meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by the formation of granulomas.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with a granulomatous infection.
meanings.sent2: The granulomatous tissue was carefully examined under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The granulomatous reaction in the body seemed like a tiny army fighting off invaders.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were a granulomatous cluster, each one a small protective barrier.
meanings.sent5: The granulomatous nature of the disease made it challenging to treat effectively.
